pullRequest.title: CLDR-13773 Add Nigerian Pidgin (pcm) keyboard
pullRequest.bodyText:
This creates a new layout for Nigerian Pidgen, allowing easy entry of vowels with acute and grave accents and also E and O with dot below. Accents are typed after the vowels and are converted to composite characters by transforms. Cntl layers have QWERTY keyboard contents.

Checklist

 Issue filed: https://unicode-org.atlassian.net/browse/CLDR-13773
 Updated PR title and link in previous line to include Issue number

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		<name value="Naijíriá Píjin"/>
          
          
            
            		<!-- also known as Naijíriá Píjin -->
          
      
    
    
  

This is the problem, <name/> is duplicated, it may only be a singleton.  https://unicode.org/reports/tr35/tr35-keyboards.html#Element_name
Localization of these names is a separate discussion… maybe worth a separate issue?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,327 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!DOCTYPE keyboard
+  SYSTEM '../dtd/ldmlKeyboard.dtd'>
+<keyboard locale="pcm-t-k0-windows">
+	<version number="$Revision$" platform="10"/>
+	<names>
+		<name value="Naijíriá Píjin"/>

commit.message:
CLDR-13773 Add Nigerian Pidgin (pcm) keyboard

See #536

beforeCommit.message:
Update keyboards/und/pcm-t-k0-windows.xml

as per suggestion from SRL.

Co-authored-by: Steven R. Loomis <srl295@gmail.com>

afterCommit.message:
CLDR-13773 Add Nigerian Pidgin (pcm) keyboard

See #536

nodes.bodyText: This should be C12 not D13, even though the key may be in the D row.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,327 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!DOCTYPE keyboard
+  SYSTEM '../dtd/ldmlKeyboard.dtd'>
+<keyboard locale="pcm-t-k0-windows">
+	<version number="$Revision$" platform="10"/>
+	<names>
+		<!-- also known as Naijíriá Píjin -->
+		<name value="Nigerian Pidgin"/>
+	</names>
+	<settings fallback="omit" transformPartial="hide"/>
+	<keyMap>
+		<map iso="E00" to="̀"/>
+		<map iso="E01" to="1"/>
+		<map iso="E02" to="2"/>
+		<map iso="E03" to="3"/>
+		<map iso="E04" to="4"/>
+		<map iso="E05" to="5"/>
+		<map iso="E06" to="6"/>
+		<map iso="E07" to="7"/>
+		<map iso="E08" to="8"/>
+		<map iso="E09" to="9"/>
+		<map iso="E10" to="0"/>
+		<map iso="E11" to="-"/>
+		<map iso="E12" to="="/>
+		<map iso="D01" to="́"/>
+		<map iso="D02" to="w"/>
+		<map iso="D03" to="e"/>
+		<map iso="D04" to="r"/>
+		<map iso="D05" to="t"/>
+		<map iso="D06" to="y"/>
+		<map iso="D07" to="u"/>
+		<map iso="D08" to="i"/>
+		<map iso="D09" to="o"/>
+		<map iso="D10" to="p"/>
+		<map iso="D11" to="["/>
+		<map iso="D12" to="]"/>
+		<map iso="D13" to="/"/>

nodes.bodyText: C12 and B00 should be defined for compatibility values:
nodes.diffHunk:

+		<map iso="D11" to="["/>

+		<map iso="C01" to="a"/>

nodes.bodyText: Keyboards should avoid defining mappings with Ctrl as these will conflict with applications.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,327 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!DOCTYPE keyboard
+  SYSTEM '../dtd/ldmlKeyboard.dtd'>
+<keyboard locale="pcm-t-k0-windows">
+	<version number="$Revision$" platform="10"/>
+	<names>
+		<!-- also known as Naijíriá Píjin -->
+		<name value="Nigerian Pidgin"/>
+	</names>
+	<settings fallback="omit" transformPartial="hide"/>
+	<keyMap>
+		<map iso="E00" to="̀"/>
+		<map iso="E01" to="1"/>
+		<map iso="E02" to="2"/>
+		<map iso="E03" to="3"/>
+		<map iso="E04" to="4"/>
+		<map iso="E05" to="5"/>
+		<map iso="E06" to="6"/>

nodes.bodyText: This doubled combining acute maps to a single combining grave, but there is no corresponding double grave to single accute so this doesn't work as a toggle to go back and forth between grave and acute. Also, because the letters followed by grave and acute map to the NFC forms, pressing combining acute twice (D01) won't toggle these accents, so additional transforms are needed to impact those if toggling is the intention of this transformation.
nodes.diffHunk:

@@ -0,0 +1,327 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!DOCTYPE keyboard
+  SYSTEM '../dtd/ldmlKeyboard.dtd'>
+<keyboard locale="pcm-t-k0-windows">
+	<version number="$Revision$" platform="10"/>
+	<names>
+		<!-- also known as Naijíriá Píjin -->
+		<name value="Nigerian Pidgin"/>
+	</names>
+	<settings fallback="omit" transformPartial="hide"/>
+	<keyMap>
+		<map iso="E00" to="̀"/>

+  SYSTEM '../dtd/ldmlKeyboard.dtd'>
+<keyboard locale="pcm-t-k0-windows">
